annotation.scene_description: Dense cluster of moderate thermal signatures in the top part suggesting vegetation. Sparse, lower thermal activity across central area. One strong thermal signature in the bottom-left with distinct shape suggesting a potential object.

anomalies.notable_features: Distinct, strong thermal signature with defined edges contrasting against the cooler surroundings.
anomalies.anomaly_reasoning: The thermal shape and intensity are consistent with a standing person or large animal due to the clear contrast and defined shape.
